term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - energy threshold in radiochemistry
term.title: energy threshold

item.text: The limiting kinetic energy of a incident particle or energy of an incident photon below which a specified process cannot take place.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2519 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
